analyzed: thera vāda vinaya
mahāvibhaṅga

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā āḷaviyaṁ viharati aggāḷave cetiye.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā āḷaviyam viharati aggāḷave cetiye

original: Tena kho pana samayena āḷavakā bhikkhū navakammaṁ karontā rukkhaṁ chindantipi chedāpentipi.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āḷavakāḥ bhikkhū nava kammam karontā rukkham chindantipi chedāpentipi
aññataraḥ api āḷavakaḥ bhikkhu rukkham chindati

original: Tasmiṁ rukkhe adhivatthā devatā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: tasmin rukkhe adhivatthā devatā tam bhikkhum etat avoca

original: “mā, bhante, attano bhavanaṁ kattukāmo mayhaṁ bhavanaṁ chindī”ti.
analyzed: mā bhante attanaḥ bhavanam kattu kāmaḥ mayham bhavanam chindi iti

original: So bhikkhu anādiyanto chindiyeva, tassā ca devatāya dārakassa bāhuṁ ākoṭesi.
analyzed: saḥ bhikkhu an ādiyantaḥ chindiya iva tassā ca devatāya dārakassa bāhum ākoṭesi
atha kho tassā devatāyai etat ahosi
yat nūna aham imam bhikkhum idha iva jīvitā voropeyyanti
atha kho tassā devatāyai etat ahosi

original: “na kho metaṁ patirūpaṁ yāhaṁ imaṁ bhikkhuṁ idheva jīvitā voropeyyaṁ.
analyzed: na kho mā etam patirūpam yā aham imam bhikkhum idha iva jīvitā voropeyya
yat nūna aham bhagavataḥ etam attham āroceyyanti

original: Atha kho sā devatā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho sā devatā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesi
sādhu sādhu devate

original: Sādhu kho tvaṁ, devate, taṁ bhikkhuṁ jīvitā na voropesi.
analyzed: sādhu kho tva devate tam bhikkhum jīvitā na voropesi

original: Sacajja tvaṁ, devate, taṁ bhikkhuṁ jīvitā voropeyyāsi, bahuñca tvaṁ, devate, apuññaṁ pasaveyyāsi.
analyzed: sacajja tva devate tam bhikkhum jīvitā voropeyyāsi bahum ca tva devate apuññam pasaveyyāsi

original: Gaccha tvaṁ, devate, amukasmiṁ okāse rukkho vivitto tasmiṁ upagacchā”ti.
analyzed: gaccha tva devate amukasmin okāse rukkhaḥ vivittaḥ tasmin upagacchāti
manussāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā rukkhaṁ chindissantipi chedāpessantipi ekindriyaṁ samaṇā sakyaputtiyā jīvaṁ viheṭhentī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma samaṇā sakya puttiyāḥ rukkham chindissanti pi chedāpessanti pi eka indriyam samaṇā sakya puttiyāḥ jīvam viheṭhenti iti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhū tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āḷavakā bhikkhū rukkhaṁ chindissantipi chedāpessantipī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma āḷavakāḥ bhikkhū rukkham chindissanti pi chedāpessanti pi iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, rukkhaṁ chindathāpi chedāpethāpī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave rukkham chindatha api chedāpetha api iti
sat ca bhagavān ati
vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, rukkhaṁ chindissathāpi, chedāpessathāpi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ rukkham chindissatha api chedāpessatha api
jīva saññinaḥ hi moghapurisāḥ manussāḥ

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha
bhūta gāma pātabya tāya pācittiyanti
bhūtagāmaḥ nāma

original: pañca bījajātāni— mūlabījaṁ, khandhabījaṁ, phaḷubījaṁ, aggabījaṁ, bījabījameva pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: pañca bīja jātāni mūla bīja khandha bīja phaḷu bīja agga bīja bīja bījam eva pañcama
mūlabījam nāma

original: haliddi, siṅgiveraṁ, vacā, vacattaṁ, ativisā, kaṭukarohiṇī, usīraṁ, bhaddamuttakaṁ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi mūle jāyanti, mūle sañjāyanti, etaṁ mūlabījaṁ nāma.

khandha bījam nāma

original: assattho, nigrodho, pilakkho, udumbaro, kacchako, kapitthano, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi khandhe jāyanti, khandhe sañjāyanti, etaṁ khandhabījaṁ nāma.
analyzed: assatthaḥ nigrodhaḥ pilakkhaḥ udumbaraḥ kacchakaḥ kapitthanaḥ yāni vā panaññāni api atthi khandhe jāyanti khandhe sañjāyanti etam khandhabījam nāma
phaḷubījam nāma

original: ucchu, veḷu, naḷo, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi pabbe jāyanti, pabbe sañjāyanti, etaṁ phaḷubījaṁ nāma.
analyzed: ucchu veḷu naḷaḥ yāni vā panaññāni api atthi pabbe jāyanti pabbe sañjāyanti etam phaḷubījam nāma
aggabījam nāma

original: ajjukaṁ, phaṇijjakaṁ, hiriveraṁ, yāni vā panaññānipi atthi agge jāyanti, agge sañjāyanti, etaṁ aggabījaṁ nāma.

analyzed: yāni vā panaññāni api atthi bīje jāyanti bīje sañjāyanti etam bījabījam nāma
